title: Styler Watch Face Creator
summary: Create your own watch face or use hundred of default or shared presets
description: Styler is watch face creator for all round and square Android 5 smart watches with hundreds of default and user shared presets.You can easily create your own watch with custom images, colors, positions etc...Features:‚úî Custom background image with image editor‚úî 6 Watch hands‚úî Watch markers‚úî Fonts and font size‚úî Weather with 3 weather providers‚úî Animation‚úî Custom colors‚úî Missed calls‚úî Unread messages‚úî Hour, Date, Month (with custom date format)‚úî Watch and phone battery indicator‚úî 24 hour indicatorConfiguration: ‚úî Screen time configuration‚úî Weather update time‚úî Simple and full ambient mode‚úî OK Google positionTip‚úî Sometimes you need to wait longer for transfer to watch‚úî If the watch face is not shown on your watch after few minutes, to try re-sync or follow these steps:‚úî Check watch battery before installingIf something go wrong in installation:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceCompatible with all Android 5 smart watchesCheck out our other watchfaces at: http://www.richface.watchor contact us on live support for any help
descriptionHTML:
Styler is watch face creator for all round and square Android 5 smart watches with hundreds of default and user shared presets.

You can easily create your own watch with custom images, colors, positions etc...

Features:
✔ Custom background image with image editor
✔ 6 Watch hands
✔ Watch markers
✔ Fonts and font size
✔ Weather with 3 weather providers
✔ Animation
✔ Custom colors
✔ Missed calls
✔ Unread messages
✔ Hour, Date, Month (with custom date format)
✔ Watch and phone battery indicator
✔ 24 hour indicator

Configuration:
✔ Screen time configuration
✔ Weather update time
✔ Simple and full ambient mode
✔ OK Google position

Tip
✔ Sometimes you need to wait longer for transfer to watch
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after few minutes, to try re-sync or follow these steps:
✔ Check watch battery before installing

If something go wrong in installation:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face

Compatible with all Android 5 smart watches

Check out our other watchfaces at: http://www.richface.watch
or contact us on live support for any help
comments: Reasonable Does what it says. Unfortunately the phone preview does not accurately represent what you get on the watch (placement of date for example: position and font don't carry over properly). Would like more date options (date only, date in a box). I am sure this will get better though!

One missing feature for me PLEASE please add the ability to search for terms in the shared watch face section. If I want a "ferrari" watch face, it'd be MUCH faster to search for it then scroll through thousands. GREAT app otherwise. I love the customization capabilities and it usually has very accurate watch faces that update flawlessly.

I've had this app for 3 minutes Much more customizable than I anticipated üòä Apple, if you're reading this, maybe you should let the owners of your products customize their devices.  I think you'd be jealous of what I made.

Really Cool App! I really love this app. I use this for my Moto 360. Very customizable and easy to use. It's much, much better than I thought it would be. I haven't had any problems operating it or  downloading presets. It's very cool and I highly recommend this. üëçüëçüëç
Shuts down intermittently In addition, shows incorrect information on watch.  Example: Text 0 / Watch 1.  For the most part I enjoy this app.  Please fix these bugs and you will get 5 stars.

Crashed asus I updated to 5 stars because it works now on asus zenwatch. Only feature id like to have added is to choose the ambient picture. I have a black and white image of my watch face that I would like to use when it goes into ambient mode.
